progress:name: Grid
progress:description: Generate new Kendo UI for Angular Grid page

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

inlineStyle.description: Include styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

pageSize.description: Sets the pageSize of a pageable Grid

height.description: Sets the height of the Grid

columns.description: Specifies the fields that will be rendered as columns in the Grid

mockedData.description: Enables the generation of a local data file

dataPath.description: Sets a path to the local data file

dataName.description: Sets a name to the local data property
